scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.build:api: echo 'API is serverless - no build needed'
scripts.build:all: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:api
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:api
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:api
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:api
